column4: but intstead now afte ri rebooted, it logs into edubuntu as default and did that take off ubuntu-desktop ?
edubuntu won't appear in the sessions list.  Log into Gnome and you will find Apps under Applications -> Education
yes you're right .. so what happen to ubuntu-desktop now ? cuz i had a different gdm theme, and everythign i know the themes are still there
that i'm not sure about sorry.  It might still be available via System -> Admin -> Login Screen Setup (iirc)
